sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: A Long-Term Study To Evaluate Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin In Patients With Fibromyalgia
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension Safety And Efficacy Study Of Pregabalin (CI-1008) For The Treatment Of Fibromyalgia
summary: This study will assess the safety and efficacy of the long-term use of pregabalin at doses up to 450 mg/day in patients with fibromyalgia who have completed 16 weeks of dosing in Study A0081208 (NCT00830167).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
